article_title: Affordable Care Act Drives Freelance Hiring

article_metadata.description: Looking to work for a big corporation? In many firms, your best opportunity could be as a freelancer, according to a new survey of human resources professionals at companies with 1,000 employees or more.
article_metadata.author: Elaine Pofeldt

og.description: Looking to work for a big corporation? In many firms, your best opportunity could be as a freelancer, according to a new survey of human resources professionals at companies with 1,000 employees or more.
